item.description:
OUTING ANNOUNCEMENT

WHERE: Duxbury Bay, Duxbury, MA

WHEN: 3 hours starting at the posted time

THE SCENE: On a beautiful little tiny peninsula-park, to one side is marshland and ocean, to the other side is a medium sized sandy beach with boats in the distance. The sunset is very nice as well.

WHERE TO MEET*: At the posted time, with 1/2 hour leeway for late-comers. Dunkin Donuts in Historic Duxbury Center

DIRECTIONS: Route 3 to Exit 10, Duxbury. From memory, get off the exit and continue straight a few miles to a sign at blinking lights that directs you to historic Duxbury. It's another few miles to the Dunkin Donuts. Duxbury is small and if you get into a bind, ask anyone.

OTHER:
RSVPs: It's best to let us know you are coming so we can look for you or alert you to any changes.
THINGS TO BRING WHICH ARE OFTEN FORGOTTEN:
Mosquito repellant, Paper towels, Sweater, water, foodIF LOST: If you become lost getting there, call.
*LAX: We meet at the time above. You have 30 minutes additional slack, after which we may leave to the painting site without you.
INCLEMENT WEATHER: It is up to you to determine if the weather makes painting untenable. Although, I will try to leave a message on my voice mail if I myself do not intend to be there.

Michael Emerald
617/968-0627
westpointusma@yahoo.com
item.name: OUTING: Duxbury Bay, Duxbury MA
